name: Homeboard
description:
"Homeboard" is a dungeon crawler gamer that uses all the keys on the keyboard.

Your keyboard is your map. You start the game from Enter key and leave your home to start your journey.  Go around and check different rooms on your keyboard. 

Make sure you have enough HP and turns to make it back home! 

Whenever you go back home (to Enter button) a day passes and enemies get stronger in coming days!

Order and buy food and items at home so you can also start your new day stronger.
